baking powder.name: Baking powder
baking powder.substitute1: 1/4 teaspoon baking soda plus 1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar
baking powder.substitute2: 1/4 teaspoon baking soda plus 1/2 cup buttermilk (decrease liquid in recipe by 1/2 cup)

baking soda.name: Baking soda
baking soda.substitute2: 1 teaspoon potassium bicarbonate and 1/3 teaspoon salt. NOTE: If the recipe calls for an acidic liquid such as sour cream, yogurt, buttermilk, vinegar, molasses, or citrus juice, you should replace it with the same amount of whole milk

brandy.name: Brandy
brandy.substitute1: 1 teaspoon imitation brandy extract plus enough water to make 1/4 cup

broth (animal).name: Broth
broth (animal).substitute1: 1 bouillon cube plus 1 cup boiling water
broth (animal).substitute2: 1 tablespoon soy sauce plus enough water to make 1 cup

brown sugar.name: Brown sugar
brown sugar.substitute1: 1 cup white sugar plus 1/4 cup molasses and decrease the liquid in recipe by 1/4 cup

buttermilk.name: Buttermilk
buttermilk.substitute2: 1 tablespoon lemon juice or vinegar plus enough milk to make 1 cup
